description: Domain AC belongs at increment level using increment-scoped domain perspective. Aggregate domain concepts, behaviors, and rules from all features in the increment. Define only facets THIS increment operates on, not entire domain model.

do.content: Increment: Basic Character Creation → Domain AC aggregates concepts from Establish Identity feature (name, concept, descriptor) and Save Character feature (persistence states). Defines Character through increment's combined lens.

dont.content: Increment: Basic Character Creation → Domain AC includes ALL Character properties from entire system (wrong - only increment-relevant)
